  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ravnovesje na klancu</string>
            <string language="en">Equilibrium on a Ramp</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichgewicht auf einer Rampe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Équilibre sur une rampe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Equilíbrio em uma rampa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Equilibrio su un Dilagare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισορροπία σε μια κεκλιμένη ράμπα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Equilibrio en una rampa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Klada na klancu in prikaz njene teže ter normalne komponente sile klanca na klado.</string>
            <string language="en">A block on an incline, visualization of its gravity and decomposition of gravity on normal component.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">normalna komponenta</string>
            <string language="en">normal component</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Block auf einer Abdachung, Sichtbarmachung 
seiner Schwerkraft und Aufspaltung von Schwerkraft auf normalem 
Bestandteil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un bloc en pente, visualisation de sa pesanteur et
décomposition de la pesanteur sur le composant normal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um bloco em um incline, visualization de sua 
gravidade e decomposition da gravidade no componente normal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un blocco su una pendenza, visualizzazione della 
relativa gravità e decomposizione di gravità sul componente normale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ομάδα δεδομένων σε μια κλίση, την απεικόνιση της 
βαρύτητάς του και την αποσύνθεση της βαρύτητας στο κανονικό 
συστατικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un bloque en una pendiente, visualización de su 
gravedad y descomposición de la gravedad en componente normal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">normaler Bestandteil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">composant normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">componente normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">componente normale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανονικό συστατικό</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">componente normal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">statics</string>
          </keyword>
